page.title: LeMaker Guitar Baseboard Rev. B Plus

revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:

B |subrevision = Plus V1.1 |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Actions Semi;S500; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 R4 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H26M41103HPR; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, LVDS, MIPI CSI, Bluetooth 4.0, Audio out 3.5mm jack, I2S, IR receiver, GPIO |addchip = PMU Audio Subsystem;Actions Semi;ATC2603C;;1;,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4421;;1;,,, 4A, 21V 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8288A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Arch Linux (Arm), Android,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B079CGX339 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723BS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== * CPU: ''[[Actions Semi]]'' S500 Quad-core Cortex-A9r4 * GPU: ''PowerVR SGX544'' * Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 * Storage: 8GB eMMC, TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot * Network: 10/100 Ethernet * WiFi & BT: Realtek RTL8732BS, Bluetooth 4.0 * GPIO: 40-pin Header w/28x GPIO * Power Source: 12V/2A via DC power
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.lemaker.org/LeMaker_Guitar ''LeMaker Guitar'' on '''LeMaker'' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_NEO_%26_AIR ''FriendlyARM NanoPi NEO & AIR'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/06/25/lemaker-guitar-is-a-25-single-board-computer-powered-by-actions-semi-s500-processor/ ''LeMaker Guitar is a $25 Single Board Computer'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
